attributes.action: put an end to crappy ports coming on to the ps3
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: since the ps3 came out in march, the ps3 has been getting crappy ports like fear, splinter cell etc and look at new crappy ports we will be getting, call of duty 4, madden 08 etc stuff like that. lets put an end to this

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
